product_name: Columbia Tree Grinder Shell Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Stay protected from cold winds and swirling snow as you carve your snowboard down the slopes with the Columbia Tree Grinder(TM) shell jacket. Waterproof, breathable Omni-Tech(R) technology keeps rain and snow out while allowing vapor to escape; underarm vents also allow airflow; jacket is fully seam sealed. Omni-Heat(R) thermal reflective lining boosts heat retention by an average of 20% over regular lining to keep you cozy on long days out in the cold. Flip up the attached hood and cinch it down to keep wind and snow flurries out. Adjustable powder skirt keeps snow from getting up into the jacket while you're skiing and snowboarding. Drawcord hem; zippered hand pockets and chest pocket; media pocket. The Columbia Tree Grinder(TM) shell jacket has a classic fit. Closeout.
